sentences.en: a game to relieve the boredom of a long journey
sentences.cn: 长途旅行中解闷的一个游戏

sentences.en: A walkman can relieve the boredom of running.
sentences.cn: 跑步时带着随身听就不那么乏味了.

sentences.en: He found the boredom scarcely endurable.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这种厌烦难以忍受.

sentences.en: I started to eat too much out of sheer boredom.
sentences.cn: 由于实在闲极无聊，我开始无节制地大吃起来。
同时，又无聊得让人苦恼不已。

sentences.en: Only a uniformed guard stultified with boredom might have overheard them.
sentences.cn: 只有一名穿制服的无聊警卫可能偷听到了他们的谈话。

sentences.en: Out of sheer boredom I would pick up a book and read on and on.
sentences.cn: 在百无聊赖中,随手抓过一本书来,读下去.

sentences.en: Some children have a low tolerance for boredom.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子很难忍受无聊.

sentences.en: Sorting mail is not a job for people with a low boredom threshold.
sentences.cn: 分拣邮件不适合那些不太能忍受乏味工作的人.

sentences.en: The boredom is caused as much by people's unsatisfying home lives as by lack of work.
sentences.cn: 不幸福的家庭生活和失业都会导致心生倦怠。

sentences.en: the double-edged quality of life in a small town—security and boredom
sentences.cn: 小城镇生活的双重性—安全但乏味

sentences.en: the sheer boredom of being in jail
They often find they begin to chat to relieve the boredom of the flight.
sentences.cn: 他们发现自己常常是为了打发飞行途中的无聊才开始聊天。

sentences.en: This should save her from boredom and will also relieve the pressure on you to keep her entertained.
sentences.cn: 这能使她不会感到厌倦，而且也会减轻你的压力，不必总想着逗她开心。

sentences.en: Unemployment can drive you mad with boredom.
sentences.cn: 失业会让你无聊得发疯.

words.tran_cn: 钻孔；使厌烦；挖空（bore的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 讨厌，令人讨厌的事物，无聊，无趣，厌倦
trans.tran_en: the feeling you have when you are bored, or the quality of being boring
